entities.name: showInfo
entities.description: A method for retrieving information about the database or table, with an optional extended information feature.

entities.name: showTablesInfo
entities.description: A method for retrieving information about the database tables, with an optional extended information feature.

entities.name: use
entities.description: A method for accessing a specific table within the database, with optional parameters for table name and schema.

entities.name: create
entities.description: A method for creating a new table in the database, allowing the definition of table name, schema, columns, and their properties.

entities.name: insert
entities.description: A method for inserting data into a table, supporting single or multiple values.

entities.name: find
entities.description: A method for retrieving values from a table, with support for conditions, joins, grouping, ordering, and pagination.

entities.name: SingleStoreClient
entities.description: A client for interacting with SingleStore databases, with optional management API access and AI functionality.

entities.name: AI
entities.description: A module for integrating AI functionality into SingleStoreClient, requiring an OpenAI API key.

entities.name: TypeScript
entities.description: A programming language used in the development of SingleStore Client.

entities.name: JavaScript
entities.description: A programming language used in the development of SingleStore Client.

relationships.description: SingleStoreClient supports integration with AI functionality through the AI module.
SingleStore Client is developed primarily in TypeScript.
SingleStore Client also includes development in JavaScript.
